subject: SQ Pro Shifter (sequential) availability
description_text:
Hi,
I'm a very happy owner of the Simsonn Pro Plus pedals now looking at expanding my setup.

I've been refreshing the product page of the SQ Pro Shifter for weeks, maybe months now. Any chance you can you give me any information on when and/or if it will be available again for ordering?

Thanks!

Kind regards,

Jelle Jansen

conversations.body_text: Hi Jelle Jansen,     We have completed the upgrade of this product and will be relisting it shortly. Thank you for your interest.
